page.title: 16ARKWRIGHT TOWN
page.content: Arkwright Town is a small village on the busy A632 Bolsover to Chesterfield road.There are five rows of terraced houses,in three streets,and 8 old peoples bungalows .There is a public house and a miners welfare in the village.There are 2 food shops,a post office,a fish shop,a garden centre and of course the school with 34 children. Originally the streets had no names but in 1950 the school children were asked to choose names for them.At the end of the village is Arkwright Colliery.A survey of the village showed that most people enjoyed living here.They would like to have a crossing on the main road.
